website_description: Build me a website that shows information about polar bears.

structure.name: App
structure.layout: The main application page layout includes a header at the top with navigation links (Home, About, Conservation, Get Involved, Donate), a routes section in the middle, and a footer at the bottom.
structure.description: This page serves as the container for common elements like the header, routes, and footer, and manages the navigation between different pages.

sections.name: Header
sections.description: Contains the logo and primary navigation links: Home, About, Conservation, Get Involved, Donate.

sections.name: Routes
sections.description: Contains the routes to pages that are defined by the navigation links in the header section.

sections.name: Footer
sections.description: Contains links to social media, terms and conditions, privacy policy, and contact information.

structure.name: HomePage
structure.layout: The homepage layout starts with a full-width image of polar bears at the top with a title below. Below the image, there's a section called 'About Polar Bears' with information on their habitat, diet, and behavior. Following this is a section providing details about conservation efforts for polar bears. The page ends with a 'Get Involved' section with information on how to support polar bear conservation.
structure.description: The homepage introduces visitors to polar bears, their habitat, conservation status, and ways to get involved in protecting them.

sections.name: TopImage
sections.description: A full-width image of polar bears with a title below it.

sections.name: AboutPolarBears
sections.description: A section with information on polar bears' habitat, diet, and behavior.

sections.name: ConservationEfforts
sections.description: A section providing details about conservation efforts for polar bears.

sections.name: GetInvolved
sections.description: A section with information on how to support polar bear conservation.

structure.name: About
structure.layout: The About page layout includes sections on the history of polar bears, their importance in the ecosystem, and current challenges they face. Each section contains detailed information and images.
structure.description: This page provides comprehensive information about the history, importance, and challenges faced by polar bears.

sections.name: HistorySection
sections.description: A section detailing the history of polar bears with images and descriptions.

sections.name: ImportanceSection
sections.description: A section describing the importance of polar bears in the ecosystem.

sections.name: ChallengesSection
sections.description: A section highlighting the current challenges faced by polar bears.

structure.name: Conservation
structure.layout: The Conservation page layout includes sections on conservation strategies, success stories, and ways to contribute to polar bear conservation efforts. Each section contains relevant information and images.
structure.description: This page provides information on conservation strategies, success stories, and opportunities to contribute to polar bear conservation efforts.

sections.name: StrategiesSection
sections.description: A section detailing conservation strategies for polar bears with images and descriptions.

sections.name: SuccessStoriesSection
sections.description: A section showcasing success stories of polar bear conservation efforts.

sections.name: ContributeSection
sections.description: A section providing ways for individuals to contribute to polar bear conservation efforts.

structure.name: GetInvolved
structure.layout: The GetInvolved page layout includes sections on volunteer opportunities, fundraising events, and educational programs. Each section contains detailed information and links to take action.
structure.description: This page provides information on how individuals can get involved in polar bear conservation through volunteering, fundraising, and educational programs.

sections.name: VolunteerOpportunitiesSection
sections.description: A section detailing volunteer opportunities for polar bear conservation with images and descriptions.

sections.name: FundraisingEventsSection
sections.description: A section describing upcoming fundraising events for polar bear conservation.

sections.name: EducationalProgramsSection
sections.description: A section listing educational programs related to polar bear conservation.

structure.name: Donate
structure.layout: The Donate page layout includes sections on different donation options, impact stories, and a donation form. Each section contains relevant information and a call to action.
structure.description: This page provides various options for making donations, impact stories showing how donations help, and a form to make a donation.

sections.name: DonationOptionsSection
sections.description: A section detailing different ways to donate with images and descriptions.

sections.name: ImpactStoriesSection
sections.description: A section showcasing stories of how donations have made an impact.

sections.name: DonationForm
sections.description: A form for making donations with fields for personal and payment information.
